statements: SELECT * FROM curriculum_materials;
SELECT material_name, resource_link FROM curriculum_materials;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM curriculum_materials WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, resource_link FROM curriculum_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, resource_link FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_description LIKE '%programming%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR material_name = 'SQL Basics' ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name, created_at FROM curriculum_materials WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_id, material_description, resource_link FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_description IS NOT NULL AND resource_link LIKE '%.pdf%' ORDER BY material_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT material_id, material_name, resource_link, created_at FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_description IS NULL AND resource_link IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal'
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'book'
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type='Metal'
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) as total_materials FROM materials GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_materials DESC
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_link LIKE '%.com%' ORDER BY resource_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT material_name, material_type, resource_name FROM materials JOIN resources ON materials.material_id = resources.resource_id
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT title, author FROM materials ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT title, author, resource_link FROM materials WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT title, category_name FROM materials JOIN material_category ON materials.material_id = material_category.material_id JOIN categories ON material_category.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT MAX(material_id), category_name FROM material_category JOIN categories ON material_category.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY MAX(material_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM materials WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT material_id, title FROM materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT m.material_id, m.title, c.category_name FROM materials m JOIN material_category mc ON m.material_id = mc.material_id JOIN categories c ON mc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM curriculum_materials;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM resources;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT course_name, course_description, material_name FROM courses JOIN curriculum_materials ON courses.course_material_id = curriculum_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM curriculum_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description, material_name FROM courses JOIN curriculum_materials ON courses.course_material_id = curriculum_materials.material_id;

SELECT course_name, resource_name, resource_link FROM courses JOIN course_material_mapping ON courses.course_material_id = course_material_mapping.course_material_id JOIN resources ON course_material_mapping.resource_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM materials LIMIT 10
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Book'
SELECT topic_name, subject_name FROM topics INNER JOIN subjects ON topics.subject_id = subjects.subject_id
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE topic_id = 3 ORDER BY resource_name DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_type='paper';
SELECT r.resource_id, r.resource_name, t.topic_name FROM resources r JOIN topics t ON r.topic_id = t.topic_id;
SELECT u.username, r.resource_name, s.subject_name FROM users u JOIN resources r ON u.user_id = r.resource_id JOIN topics t ON r.topic_id = t.topic_id JOIN subjects s ON t.subject_id = s.subject_id;
